title: Technology
author: verias
text:
So, I had this entirely fun thing I was working on, of Mandrake, by the pool, levitating a book while she read, in a swimsuit.

Lo and behold, as I'm finishing up the sketch and prepping to start inking, my software hangs for about 2 seconds, almost like it's taking a moment to think, and then catch up. Then bam, it's gone. The window, the art, the sketch, all of it, just gone.

Needless to say I was quite irritated. I took a step back, ate dinner, fiddled around in a shoot 'em up game for a bit, and grabbed this for you guys to see.

Lesson 1: Save early, save often.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text:
NOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!! XD

But yeah, stuff like that always seems to happen right at the end. Never like the first half hour when it's just the barest outline.

replies.author: AnrDaemon*Guest*
